battery-type.description: Type of battery used in the UAV (e.g., LiPo, Li-ion, NiMH).

camera-present.description: Indicates whether the UAV is equipped with a camera.

country-of-operation.description: Country where the UAV is primarily operated.

fcc-id.description: FCC ID assigned to the UAV.

firmware-version.description: Firmware version installed on the UAV.

first-seen.description: First time this UAV has been seen

geo-location.description: Geographical location where the UAV was observed or operated (longitude, latitude).

imei.description: International Mobile Equipment Identity (IMEI) number of the UAV, if applicable.

last-seen.description: Last time this UAV has been seen

mac-address.description: MAC address of the UAV's communication module.

notes.description: Additional notes or comments about the UAV.

operator.description: Entity or individual operating the UAV.

payload.description: Description of any payload the UAV is carrying (e.g., sensors, delivery package).

power-plant.description: Type of power plant used in the UAV (e.g., electric, fuel-based).

registration-id.description: Official registration ID assigned to the UAV by aviation authorities.

remote-controller-id.description: Identifier of the remote controller paired with the UAV.

type.description: Type of the UAV (e.g., quadcopter, fixed-wing, etc.)

description: Unmanned Aerial Vehicle (UAV) or drone asset details.
name: uav
